title: Chile: hasta cuando?(Captioned)
brief_description: An account of the political unrest in Chile, 12 years after the murder of Allende and the installation of military dictatorship under General Pinochet. This powerful documentary is also about the struggle of the people of Chile. Under the dictatorship of Pinochet some 50,000 Chileans were detained, many are missing believed dead.
